reviewText: Have a little problem with  viewing this dvd it seems to stop from time to time but it gives you the basic steps and helps when you go out and everyone is dancing at least you know the basic steps

Instruction is very basic.  The music with the instruction DVD isn't the actual song that goes with the dances, just instrumental.  Although there is a second CD that has the actual songs on it.  I had more fun following along with the song on the CD as the singer called out the moves.  Would be better if it were all on one.

I had never heard of most of these dances and I have to admit I had no idea what I was getting into when buying this, other than I've been a big fan of Christy's for a while. This video is packed with all sorts of fun dances of all different styles. I really enjoyed playing a long and I would I would highly recommend it! ***Nice and current***

I've loved Christy's products for a long time, this is a really great updated edition!  You won't be disappointed.  I've been trying to learn dance for a long time and Christy's videos, including this one, are the best way to learn that I've found.
